body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Handheld Clothes Steamer with Brush Ironing Gloves, 1350W Strong Power Garment Steamer with 380ml Tank, Fast Heat-up, Auto-Off Portable Fabric Steam Iron Fabric Wrinkle Remover
features: 𝑷𝑶𝑾𝑬𝑹𝑭𝑼𝑳 𝑪𝑳𝑶𝑻𝑯𝑬𝑺 𝑺𝑻𝑬𝑨𝑴𝑬𝑹: 1350W handheld steamer instantly smooths out wrinkles in clothing while deep clean your clothes and also remove odors for a complete clean experience. 𝑻𝒊𝒑𝒔: With a removable brushes to brush away dirt and smooth out lint on clothes.

𝟑𝟔𝟎°𝑳𝑬𝑨𝑲-𝑷𝑹𝑶𝑶𝑭: No leaking at any angle when ironing, keep clothes dry without leaving water stains. The clothes steamer allows you to iron from any angle, even allows steaming upside down. 𝑻𝒊𝒑𝒔:The heat resistant steamer glove can isolate the heat and can be used as an small ironing board.

𝑫𝑬𝑻𝑨𝑪𝑯𝑨𝑩𝑳𝑬 𝑾𝑨𝑻𝑬𝑹 𝑻𝑨𝑵𝑲: 380ml water tank which can provide better full steam and extend the working time of up to 30 minutes, reducing the trouble of frequent water addition and saving you time. 𝑻𝒊𝒑𝒔: With a water cup which make it convenient for you to fill the steamer with water before use.

𝑬𝑿𝑻𝑹𝑨-𝑳𝑶𝑵𝑮 𝟗.𝟖𝟓𝑭𝑻 𝑪𝑶𝑹𝑫: 9.85ft extended power cord, unrestricted ironing and satisfy your whole house ironing. With a longer cord, you'll be able to steam hard-to-reach areas. Instantly erase all wrinkles from your favorite suit, shirt, dress and steaming beddings effortless. 𝑻𝒊𝒑𝒔: After pressing the steam Lock button, the garment steamer will always produce steam, which is convenient for your long-term ironing needs

𝟑 𝑰𝑹𝑶𝑵𝑰𝑵𝑮 𝑴𝑶𝑫𝑬𝑺: This steamer for clothesr has three adjustable modes, Low steam mode can smooth most creases, high steam mode penetrates the fabric thoroughly, smoothing out hard creases on thick fabrics. Steam any fabric from cotton, wool, silk, fiber etc. Wrinkle free and refresh everything from clothing to bedding and curtains.

𝑷𝑶𝑹𝑻𝑨𝑩𝑳𝑬 𝑻𝑹𝑨𝑽𝑬𝑳 𝑺𝑻𝑬𝑨𝑴𝑬𝑹: This clothing steamer, hand-held steamer, is light and easy to move and use, very suitable for travel and business. 𝑻𝒊𝒑𝒔: Place your travel steamer, fabric brush and mini water cup in the pouch comes with and just place it in your travel bag.

𝑾𝑯𝑨𝑻 𝒀𝑶𝑼 𝑮𝑬𝑻: 1x Clothes Steamer,1x Measuring Cup, 1x Lint Brush, 1x Fabric Brush, 1x Storage Bag, 1x Instructions, 1x Packing Box. And our worry-free lifetime warranty, and friendly customer service. 𝑰𝒇 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒉𝒂𝒗𝒆 𝒂𝒏𝒚 𝒒𝒖𝒆𝒔𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔 𝒂𝒃𝒐𝒖𝒕 𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒅𝒉𝒆𝒍𝒅 𝒈𝒂𝒓𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕 𝒔𝒕𝒆𝒂𝒎𝒆𝒓, 𝒑𝒍𝒆𝒂𝒔𝒆 𝒄𝒐𝒏𝒕𝒂𝒄𝒕 𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒄𝒖𝒔𝒕𝒐𝒎𝒆𝒓 𝒔𝒆𝒓𝒗𝒊𝒄𝒆 𝒅𝒊𝒓𝒆𝒄𝒕𝒍𝒚, 𝒘𝒆 𝒘𝒊𝒍𝒍 𝒅𝒐 𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒃𝒆𝒔𝒕 𝒕𝒐 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒗𝒊𝒅𝒆 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒘𝒊𝒕𝒉 𝒔𝒆𝒓𝒗𝒊𝒄𝒆.
body.description: You’ll fall in love with this home multi-use, durability, and the portable steamer for clothes, which is the first choice for travel and office work! Don’t let annoying creases and wrinkles ruin your moments or trips. ♠️3 STEAM OPTIONS Low, Medium or high mode for your options, this portable steamer can easily deal with fine & deep wrinkles. ♠️ON/OFF BUTTON & LOCK TRIGGER Easy access On/Off button with indicator light, simple to lock the trigger for a continuous flow of steam. ♠️USE AT ANY ANGLE With the heated soleplate, there will be no condensation and you can use it both in horizontal as well as vertical motion. ♠️WIDE STEAM HEAD Refresh fabrics with a wide steam head, which allows powerful steam to flow efficiently from the steamer onto fabrics for fast results. ♠️USEFUL BRUSH Comes with an attachable fabric brush that helps remove lint. Do not use it if you don't have to remove lint. ♠️FAST PREHEAT TIME The steamer heats up in around 30 seconds, delivering a quick performance so you can finish your tasks and get back to your life. ♠️COMPACT, LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN The handheld design is comfortable to hold and easy to pack for travel. 380ML Detachable Water Tank,25 minutes steam output allows you to straighten more clothes at one time. ♠️THE IDEAL TRAVEL COMPANION Particularly compact design for travel and business trips. One filling is enough for a 25 min continue steam. ♠️THE PERFECT GIFT One of the most useful gifts to surprise your loved ones with. Make your family and friends happy with this wonderful iron steamer. ♾️ACCESSORIES: ⏩Garment steamer x 1 ⏩Ironing Glovesx 1 ⏩Fabric brush x 1 ⏩Measuring cup x 1 ⏩User manual x 1 ⏩Storage bag x 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Steamer Ever!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a handy steamer for my home, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer. The compact and lightweight design of the steamer makes it very easy to use and store, and it heats up quickly, so I can start steaming my clothes almost immediately. The steamer is very versatile and can be used to remove wrinkles from a variety of fabrics, including cotton, silk, and polyester. I was initially worried about using it on delicate fabrics, but the steamer has proven to be gentle enough to use on even the most delicate of fabrics without causing any damage. Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase of the handy steamer. It is a high-quality and versatile product that has made my life a lot easier. I would highly recommend this steamer to anyone looking for a quick and efficient way to remove wrinkles from their clothes.The product was on sale and the price was great. The continuous steam option is a very useful feature. The steamer is powerful. There is a faint humming sound which is expected from most handheld steamers. It also comes with all the accessories needed and also a CUP. That's very thoughtful!It is lightweight and easy to use. If you don't have an iron board or don't have time to set up the iron board every time, then this is the best option for you.
